panels.title: batcher_proposal_started
panels.description: Counter of proposals started

panels.title: batcher_proposal_succeeded
panels.description: Counter of successful proposals

panels.title: batcher_proposal_failed
panels.description: Counter of failed proposals

panels.title: batcher_batched_transactions
panels.description: Counter of batched transactions across all forks

panels.title: consensus_block_number
panels.description: The block number consensus is working to decide

panels.title: consensus_round
panels.description: The round of the state machine

panels.title: consensus_max_cached_block_number
panels.description: How many blocks after current are cached

panels.title: consensus_cached_votes
panels.description: How many votes are cached when starting to work on a new block number

panels.title: consensus_decisions_reached_by_consensus
panels.description: The total number of decisions reached by way of consensus

panels.title: consensus_decisions_reached_by_sync
panels.description: The total number of decisions reached by way of sync

panels.title: consensus_proposals_received
panels.description: The total number of proposals received

panels.title: consensus_proposals_valid_init
panels.description: The total number of proposals received with a valid init

panels.title: consensus_proposals_validated
panels.description: The total number of complete, valid proposals received

panels.title: consensus_proposals_invalid
panels.description: The total number of proposals that failed validation

panels.title: consensus_build_proposal_total
panels.description: The total number of proposals built

panels.title: consensus_build_proposal_failed
panels.description: The number of proposals that failed to be built

panels.title: consensus_reproposals
panels.description: The number of reproposals sent

panels.title: consensus_new_value_locks
panels.description: The number of times consensus has attained a lock on a new value

panels.title: consensus_held_locks
panels.description: The number of times consensus progressed to a new round while holding a lock

panels.title: consensus_timeouts
panels.description: The number of times consensus has timed out

panels.title: consensus_num_batches_in_proposal
panels.description: The number of transaction batches in a valid proposal received

panels.title: consensus_num_txs_in_proposal
panels.description: The total number of individual transactions in a valid proposal received

panels.title: cende_last_prepared_blob_block_number
panels.description: The blob block number that cende knows. That means the sequencer can be the proposer only if the current height is greater by one than this value.

panels.title: cende_prepare_blob_for_next_height_latency
panels.description: The time it takes to prepare the blob for the next height, i.e create the blob object.

panels.title: cende_write_prev_height_blob_latency
panels.description: Be careful with this metric, if the blob was already written by another request, the latency is much lower since wirting to Aerospike is not needed.

panels.title: http_server_added_transactions_total
panels.description: Total number of transactions added

panels.title: apollo_state_sync_processed_transactions
panels.description: The number of transactions processed by the state sync component

panels.title: apollo_state_sync_reverted_transactions
panels.description: The number of transactions reverted by the state sync component

panels.title: apollo_mempool_p2p_num_connected_peers
panels.description: The number of connected peers to the mempool p2p component

panels.title: apollo_mempool_p2p_num_sent_messages
panels.description: The number of messages sent by the mempool p2p component

panels.title: apollo_mempool_p2p_num_received_messages
panels.description: The number of messages received by the mempool p2p component

panels.title: apollo_mempool_p2p_broadcasted_transaction_batch_size
panels.description: The number of transactions in batches broadcast by the mempool p2p component

panels.title: apollo_consensus_num_connected_peers
panels.description: The number of connected peers to the consensus p2p component

panels.title: apollo_consensus_votes_num_sent_messages
panels.description: The number of messages sent by the consensus p2p component over the Votes topic

panels.title: apollo_consensus_votes_num_received_messages
panels.description: The number of messages received by the consensus p2p component over the Votes topic

panels.title: apollo_consensus_proposals_num_sent_messages
panels.description: The number of messages sent by the consensus p2p component over the Proposals topic

panels.title: apollo_consensus_proposals_num_received_messages
panels.description: The number of messages received by the consensus p2p component over the Proposals topic

panels.title: apollo_p2p_sync_num_connected_peers
panels.description: The number of connected peers to the p2p sync component

panels.title: apollo_p2p_sync_num_active_inbound_sessions
panels.description: The number of inbound sessions to the p2p sync component

panels.title: apollo_p2p_sync_num_active_outbound_sessions
panels.description: The number of outbound sessions to the p2p sync component

panels.title: gateway_transactions_received
panels.description: Counter of transactions received

panels.title: gateway_transactions_received
panels.description: Counter of transactions received

panels.title: gateway_transactions_received_rate (TPS)
panels.description: The rate of transactions received by the gateway during the last 20 minutes

panels.title: gateway_add_tx_latency
panels.description: Latency of gateway add_tx function in secs

panels.title: gateway_validate_tx_latency
panels.description: Latency of gateway validate function in secs

panels.title: gateway_transactions_failed
panels.description: Counter of failed transactions

panels.title: gateway_transactions_sent_to_mempool
panels.description: Counter of transactions sent to the mempool

panels.title: mempool_transactions_received
panels.description: Counter of transactions received by the mempool

panels.title: mempool_transactions_received_rate (TPS)
panels.description: The rate of transactions received by the mempool during the last 20 minutes

panels.title: mempool_transactions_dropped
panels.description: Counter of transactions dropped from the mempool

panels.title: mempool_txs_committed
panels.description: The number of transactions that were committed to block

panels.title: mempool_pool_size
panels.description: The average size of the pool

panels.title: mempool_priority_queue_size
panels.description: The average size of the priority queue

panels.title: mempool_pending_queue_size
panels.description: The average size of the pending queue

panels.title: mempool_total_size_bytes
panels.description: The average total transaction size in bytes over time in the mempool

panels.title: mempool_get_txs_size
panels.description: The average size of the get_txs

panels.title: mempool_delayed_declare_size
panels.description: The average number of delayed declare transactions

panels.title: mempool_transaction_time_spent
panels.description: The time (secs) that a transaction spent in the mempool

panels.title: class_cache_miss_ratio
panels.description: The ratio of cache misses when requesting compiled classes from the apollo state reader

panels.title: native_class_returned_ratio
panels.description: The ratio of Native classes returned by the apollo state reader
